amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the approval of the statehood option by a super-majority of 75 percent of the valid votes cast.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the provisions allowing for approval of any status option by a simple majority and inserting provisions which require approval of a commonwealth or seperate sovereignty option by a simple majority and specifying that approval of a statehood option must be by a super-majority of 75 percent of valid votes cast.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 282 (Roll no. 34).
